text: Viridian is a teal-green color with a hue toward green. The name comes from the Latin word viridis which means "green". ==Meaning of viridian== * Viridian is a pigment used in art. * Viridian is a popular color for painting dining rooms. * Viridian is the name of a city in the English translation of Pok√©mon Red and Blue. * Viridian is a name on several cards in Magic: The Gathering. * The color is similar to the color forest green, and both colors are thought of as having to do with forests and woods. * Viridian represents the Viridian Design Movement, an effort to encourage green architecture--architecture based on ecological principles. ==Tones of viridian color comparison chart== * Malachite (Maerz & Paul) (Hex: #0BDA51) (RGB: 11, 218, 81) * Emerald (Maerz & Paul) (Hex: #50C878) (RGB: 80, 200, 120) * Caribbean Green (Crayola) (Hex: #00CC99)
